segment.source: Use the information in this section when you plan your Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 project.
segment.target: Use the information in this section when you plan your Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 project.

segment.source: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed
segment.target: Determining How MED-V Will Be Deployed

segment.source: Provides information to help you determine how to deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise.
segment.target: Provides information to help you determine how to deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise.

segment.source: Identifying the Number and Types of MED-V Workspaces
segment.target: Identifying the Number and Types of MED-V Workspaces

segment.source: Provides information to help you identify the computers in your enterprise that require MED-V and to calculate the disk space necessary for a MED-V deployment.
segment.target: Provides information to help you identify the computers in your enterprise that require MED-V and to calculate the disk space necessary for a MED-V deployment.
